scripts.seed-supabase: tsx -e "import { seedSupabaseData } from './src/infrastructure/supabase/seed'; seedSupabaseData().then(() => console.log('✅ Seeding complete')).catch(console.error)"
scripts.setup-sqlite: tsx -e "import { setupSQLiteDatabase } from './src/infrastructure/sqlite/setup'; setupSQLiteDatabase().then(() => console.log('✅ SQLite setup complete')).catch(console.error)"
scripts.seed-sqlite: tsx -e "import { seedSQLiteData } from './src/infrastructure/sqlite/seed'; seedSQLiteData().then(() => console.log('✅ SQLite seeding complete')).catch(console.error)"
